riskEvent.why: Impending cyclonic storm coinciding with high spring tide.

messages.smsShort: SEVERE ALERT: Cyclone approaching Sundarbans. High tide will increase flood risk. Evacuate low-lying areas within 24 hours.
messages.dashboard: Risk Score: 85/100 (Red). Cyclone 'Sagar' is expected to make landfall near the Sundarbans. High spring tide will amplify storm surge. Evacuation protocols should be initiated for vulnerable zones.

riskEvent.why: Strong offshore winds and continuous moderate rainfall increasing erosion risk.

messages.smsShort: MODERATE ALERT: Rough seas and erosion risk at Puri Coast for next 48 hrs. Fishermen advised not to venture into the sea.
messages.dashboard: Risk Score: 58/100 (Yellow). Persistent strong winds and rainfall are causing rough sea conditions. Increased risk of beach erosion. Coastal tourism activities should be limited.

riskEvent.why: All parameters normal. Routine periodic assessment.

messages.smsShort: INFO: Conditions at Gahirmatha Sanctuary are stable. All environmental parameters are within normal range.
messages.dashboard: Risk Score: 12/100 (Green). Routine system check confirms stable conditions. No immediate threats detected. Water quality and mangrove health are normal.

riskEvent.why: Industrial effluent spill detected upstream, potential for coastal contamination with incoming tide.

messages.smsShort: HEALTH ADVISORY: Chemical spill alert for Mumbai Coast. Avoid contact with sea water for the next 6 hours. Details to follow.
messages.dashboard: Risk Score: 72/100 (Red). An industrial effluent spill has been detected. The incoming tide is projected to bring contaminants to the coastline. A public health advisory is in effect.
